amendment.description: Page 286, line 24, after the dollar amount, insert "(increased by $161,725,000)". Page 288, line 15, after the dollar amount, insert "(reduced by $323,450,000)".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Mitchell amendment (A018) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
